field.name: summary
field.value: Mono async actions fail to find proper context to release AR session

field.name: description

comment.author: Brian.Saville
comment.text: The fix in BaseAsyncHttpHandler works. My problem is that I'm having trouble coming up with a test case to catch this problem, probably because I don't understand exactly what happens and why it only happens in Mono. Anyone have some advice? Obviously the HttpContext.Current is not set correctly, in fact it is null on the End method in Mono, but works fine for MS.NET.

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text: MonoRail2 is not actively maintained, closing this issue as won't fix because of its age. Feel free to relog a new issue on GitHub: https://github.com/castleproject/MonoRail/issues
